```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
df<-read.csv("averages.csv",row.names =1)
counts<-read.csv("counts.csv")
colnames(counts)<-c("Site","geo_index","Year","n")

counts %>% group_by(Site) %>% summarize(n=sum(n)) %>% summarize(total=sum(n))

counts %>% group_by(Site, Year) %>% summarize(n=sum(n)) %>% data.frame()
```

```{r}
ggplot(df,aes(x=height_mean,y=area_mean,size=n)) + geom_point(alpha=0.5) + labs(x="Crown Height (m)",y="Crown Area (m^2)",size="Trees/km^2") + geom_text(aes(label=Site),size=2,hjust=0.5,vjust=-0.5) + theme_bw()
ggsave("Attributes.png",height=3.5,width=6)
ggsave("Attributes.svg", height=3.5,width=6)
```

## Counts through time

```{r}
counts %>% spread(Year,n) %>% ggplot(.,aes(x=`2019`,y=`2018`)) + geom_point(aes(col=Site),alpha=0.5) + geom_abline(linetype="dashed") + coord_equal() + stat_smooth(method="lm") + theme(legend.position = "none") + scale_x_continuous(labels=comma) + scale_y_continuous(labels=comma) + ggtitle("Tree Count Across Years")
ggsave("CrossYears.png",height=4,width=7)
```
